title: LOKFAR 1PCS Metallic Nail Polish Nail Art Gel Paint for Nails Art, 3D Reflective Metallic Painted Nail Gel Liner Nail Art Polish UV Gold Gel Nail Polish Nail Painting Gel for Nail Art Nail Salon (Gold)
features: 【METALLIC NAIL ART GEL PAINT GEL】- The net content of this gold gel nail polish/ metallic nail art gel paint gel is 5g, which can meet your daily DIY design of various nail decoration patterns: pull lines, flowers, stars, circles, nail art reliefs, etc.

【3D METALLIC MANICURE SALON】- The shiny reflective nail paint gel with full metallic feeling is the exclusive choice for nail DIY salons who love nail art. 3D and high-quality texture, good toughness, cool colors, let you easily enjoy your own DIY nail design, making your fingertips more attractive.

【CRUELTY FREE & WAROM TIPS】- This gel liner nail art paint polish is made of natural resin, safe and non-toxic formula, mild smell and non-irritating. It is cruelty free, not tested on animals. This nail art gel polish needs to be used together with the top coat gel, and it needs to be cured under UV/ LED lamp.

【LONG-LASTING】- This gel nail art polish is suitable for all seasons and most occasions. You can freely create your own nail art whether you are attending parties, vacations, various festivals, masquerades and daily life. It is also long-lasting and waterproof, and can be maintained for at least 3 weeks through correct use.
【EASY TO CARRY】- Lightweight design, the bottle size is 1.34*1.34*0.94 inches, easy to carry. Widely used in natural nails, UV gel nails, false nails, acrylic nails, nail tips, etc.
description: 1PCS Metallic Gel Nail Polish/ Gold Nail Polish/ Nail Art Gel Nail Painting Polish/ Blooming Gel Polish/ Nail Paint Reflective Gel Polish/ Gel Liner Nail Art Gel Polish/ Gel Nail Art Polish/ Gel Paint for Nails Art Nail Salon

Perfect salon quality, easy to create nail art manicure salon DIY at home.  6. Long lasting and waterproof for 2-3 weeks.  7. Easy to carry, apply and remove.

1. Apply Base Coat Gel, cure with a UV lamp, then apply Color Gel, and cure again with UV lamp. 2. Use Metallic Painted Nail Gel to draw your favorite pattern, let it stand for 30s, and then cure it with a UV lamp for 60s. 3. Apply the Top Coat Gel, and finally cure it with a UV lamp, the effect is complete.
